sentences.english: We Spaniards have lined up against each other all too often.
sentences.chinese: 我们西班牙人太爱窝里斗了。

sentences.english: And they would always prefer to fight inside of their own and they would not like to fight outside.
sentences.chinese: 他们总是宁愿在窝里斗，而不喜欢跟外人打。

sentences.english: There were no politics on our team.
sentences.chinese: 在我们团队里没有窝里斗。
